item.title: John Carmack on Java, Phones, and Gaming

content.p: John Carmack, the primary developer of Doom and Quake at id Software, posted some great comments on his recent experiments with cellphone game development in Java. My favorite?

blockquote.i: there is something deeply wrong when text editing on a 3.6 ghz processor is anything but instantaneous.

content.p: That's quote of the month material.
